title: Monsoon rains: IESCO operations, GSO formations put on high alert
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP):In view of monsoon rains, on directives of IESCO Chief Executive Mohammad Naeem Jan, IESCO operations, construction and GSO formations have been put on high alert for timely redressal of electricity-related complaints.
Leaves of officials have also been cancel and they were also to stay on duty, said a press release issued here Sunday.
Meanwhile, IESCO management has requested the users to keep proper distance from electric wires, poles, transformers, meters and other IESCO installations during rain. Do not touch refrigerator, iron, motor, door bell and other electrical appliances with wet hands or wet body or bare feet.
Do not iron clothes with bare feet and to avoid loss of life and property due to shot circuit, repair old, damaged and weak electrical wiring. Never go near broken electrical wire, it said.
In view of any complaint or emergency situation, file a complaint on the relevant SDO Complaint Office number, Helpline number 118, Complaint and Monitoring Cell numbers 0519252933, 0519252934.
